word: H7087 - קָפָא - qâphâʼ - kaw-faw' - Congeal - உறைந்துபோ

sections.paragraph: to thicken, to condense, to congeal, to settle, to become dense
a) (Qal) to be condensed; a thickening (participle)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to shrink, that is, thicken (as unracked wine, curdled milk, clouded sky, frozen water): - congeal, curdle, dark`, settle.
